section.title: Ideas and perspectives you won’t find anywhere else.
section.text: BlogWorld taps into the brains of the world’s most insightful writers, thinkers, and storytellers to bring you the smartest takes on topics that matter. So whatever your interest, you can always find fresh thinking and unique perspectives.

This methods class of artificial intelligence is on everyone’s lips. And all because it solves problems not directly, but by learning in the process of performing many specific tasks.
With the help of machine learning, it is possible to

the work of websites and applications, so, in the upcoming year such tasks as speech, face and visual images recognition, process of diagnostics and results prediction, analysis and sorting of large data volumes will become even easier.
Voice command is really very fast.
A person does not need to learn how to navigate the graphical interface and how to use it for an intended purpose. We began to speak almost from birth, and this our skill is very well developed.

People have always sought to make things easier, but more effective. Digital area has already grown out a bit from regular graphical navigation, and one of the most affordable alternatives is the voice interface. However, it will
not all the functions of the UI, but will only become an intermediary between the user and the main function of the site. Why? Here are some of the key arguments.
